The company has a long and successful history of developing and manufacturing dietary supplements in the form of tablets and capsules containing, among other things, vitamins, minerals, herbs, natural ingredients and extracts, adaptogens, nutraceuticals, and nutrients.
   

  

 Our headquarters and production facility are located in Åkersberga, outside of Stockholm.
   

  

 We are ISO-certified according to FSSC 22000.
   

  

 We are now looking for a new team member to join our growing quality department. The position is a temporary role for 6 months, full-time, with an immediate start or as agreed, with the possibility of extension.
   

  

**Selected Job Responsibilities:**
* Responsible for deviation investigations, both internal and external customer complaints.
* Conduct training for the rest of the staff on food safety.
* As part of the team, you will be responsible for maintaining and developing routines for quality and ensuring product safety in the department, as well as monitoring industry issues.
* Analyze and release raw materials, packaging materials, and finished products.
* Conduct self-inspections/internal audits of the operations.
* Actively work on improvements and efficiencies.


**Who are we looking for?**
* We are looking for someone who is positive and solution-oriented.
* As a person, you are independent, meticulous, analytical, and structured.
* You should have an academic degree in a relevant field, such as food science, pharmacology, chemistry, microbiology, or equivalent.
* Ability to work independently as well as in a team.
* It doesn't matter if you are junior—maybe this is your second job in your career?
* Experience with quality management systems is considered a merit.

title: Sales Intern from Switzerland
description:
🎉
 **Awesome Opportunity: Sales Intern Role at KAYAKOMAT by Point 65 Sweden - Start ASAP** 
 🌟
 



  





 Hallo, Hi, Hej,
 



  





 Are you a
 
 native
 
 of Switzerland and fluent in Swiss German? Well, buckle up because we've got something super exciting for you! 🚀
 



  





 Are you dreaming of an experience that's not just a job but a whole adventure?
 




 Picture
 
 this: a mix of remote work and chilling at our Stockholm office, surrounded by the serene beauty of the Karlberg Canal, with our own jetty, sauna, and kayaks! Yup, that's where the magic happens at KAYAKOMAT by Point 65 Sweden! 🌊🛶
 



  





 We're on the hunt for a sales intern who's not just fluent in Swiss German but is also ready to dive into a world of paddle sports and SaaS revolution! 🌍🛶
 



  





**About KAYAKOMAT by Point 65 Sweden:** 




 We're not just any company; we're Scandinavia's paddle sport pioneers! Since '96, we've been ruling the waves with our SUP and kayak rentals. And guess what? Our unmanned SaaS concept, KAYAKOMAT, took the world by storm in 2020! With nearly 250 stations across Europe and North America, we're not just leading; we're dominating! 💪
 



  





**Work Description:** 



* Gear up to be a sales superhero! You'll be assisting in locations hunt in Germany and keep the sales running.
* Dive deep into market research and uncover exciting business opportunities.
* Be the ultimate relationship builder! Maintain awesome connections with municipalities, private landowners and leads.
* Get creative and help craft killer sales materials and presentations.



**Requirements:** 



* Got the gift of the gab? Excellent communication skills are a must!
* You're a team player, but you can also rock it solo!
* Attention to detail? Check!
* Tech-savvy? Bring it on!
* Don't forget your laptop and phone!
* Fluent in German verbal and written. Bonus points for extra language skills!
* Ready to hustle? We need asap - applications are open 📅



**Benefits:** 



* Work from our kick-ass Stockholm office with sauna on cold days and summer swims from our jetty!
* Dive headfirst into the world of SaaS and paddle sports. It's not just a job; it's an adventure!
* We've got your back! You will be in Team DACH and joining the A-team!



  





 Hurry up! We're already sifting through applications, so jump on board ASAP! 🚣‍♀️
 



  





 Contact:
 



 Stefanie Sauter, Country Manager Germany
 



 Email: stefanie.sauter@kayakomat.com
 



 Ready to ride the waves with us at KAYAKOMAT by Point 65 Sweden? Apply now by sending your resume and a cheeky cover letter showcasing your language skills and sales prowess to Stefanie Sauter.
 



  





 Catch you on the flip side!
 



 Best,
 



 Stefanie Sauter
 



 Country Manager Germany
 



 KAYAKOMAT by Point 65 Sweden

title: Client Manager
description:
**Client Manager at Mindshare in Stockholm**
 Mindshare is seeking a driven and solution-focused Client Manager who thrives on working closely with clients and excels at delivering exceptional communication solutions. You have a passion for leading and inspiring a team of channel specialists across online and offline media, you will craft innovative strategies tailored to your clients' needs. You’ll oversee all aspects of campaigns, from brief, planning and execution to analysis and optimization.
   

  

 Leveraging your deep understanding of clients' businesses and the dynamic media landscape, you will lead operational assignments, driving the development of cutting-edge media strategies with your dedicated team.
   

  

**To succeed in the role of Client Manager, you need:**
* A broad understanding of the digital and traditional media (online/offline) ecosystem, and the synergies between them.
* The ability to see both the big picture and the details in what you and your team are expected to deliver, understanding the importance of both.


**The three best things about the job:**
* An exciting opportunity to manage the daily work in media planning for many of Sweden's and the world’s most ambitious brands.
* A chance to develop your leadership skills by leading client teams consisting of specialists across all media types.
* A strong sense of teamwork within the close-knit "purple family" that’s hard to find elsewhere!


**Who are you?**
* You are passionate about media and marketing and are constantly curious to learn.
* You are a solution-oriented team player who easily collaborates with others.
* You are organized and possess administrative skills.
* You thrive in a fast-paced environment and used to working in a proactive manner.
* You understand the importance of strong relationships and build them in all contexts.
* You can see both the big picture and the details in what you and your team are expected to deliver, and you understand the importance of both.
* You excel in an international environment.
* You manage Swedish in both spoken and written form, and you handle English well both in writing and speaking.
* You have a curious, positive, with a can-do-attitude and with lots of energy.


**What experience do we expect you to have?**
* You have experience (minimum 4 years) in project management work, either from an agency, media, or client side.
* You are well-versed in digital communication and have a strong understanding of the digital ecosystem, but also have experience in other media types and the synergies between them.
* You are used to independently managing and developing assignments and getting your team on board.
* You are a good presenter with strong social skills and are an excellent communicator.


**It is also an advantage if you...**
* Have a background in digital media planning.
* Have a degree in economics or equivalent from a college/university.


**What do we offer you?**
* A proactive and participatory role that spans across several client teams and departments.
* Client assignments with well-known brands and exciting challenges in an ever-changing industry.
* Being part of a global media agency network with access to the latest in media, technology, and insights.
* Great opportunities to develop your role and assignments.
* A family-like atmosphere, short decision-making paths, and proximity between management and employees.


 Application selections are ongoing, so send your application with CV and personal letter as soon as possible. The position is a full-time role based at our office in Stockholm and begins with a six-month probationary period.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position, you are welcome to contact Claudio Moyano, Client Group Director at Mindshare Sweden.
   

  

**About Mindshare**
 Mindshare is a media and communications agency that aims to push the boundaries of what is possible. Our vision, "To Make Advertising Welcome," was developed together and is about contributing to the creation and dissemination of advertising and marketing with integrity and awareness. We want advertising to serve a purpose, bring a smile, and above all, benefit our clients' businesses and brands. We believe that to be great, you must be bold, and you also must be bold to do what’s right.
   

  

 Mindshare is part of GroupM and is a subsidiary of WPP plc - one of the world's largest media agencies with 9,300 employees in 116 offices across 82 countries. In Sweden, Mindshare has 54 employees, 8 of whom are based in Gothenburg, with clients including advertisers such as SAS, Viaplay, Stadium, Unilever, Volvo Cars, and Visit Sweden.
   

  

 At Mindshare, you will have the opportunity to work with many of Sweden's and the world's most ambitious brands together with a team that is passionate about developing our clients' businesses. There are great opportunities for personal development and career growth within Mindshare and GroupM Sweden, as well as within our global network.
   

  

 Get to know us even more!

title: Microsoft 365/Full Stack Developer
description:
**M I C R O S O F T 3 6 5 / F U L L S T A C K D E V E L O P E R
   

  

 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_**
 Full-time | Permanent
   

  

**A B O U T X E N I T**
 Xenit is a growth company which specializes in Cloud and modern work. Our committed employees inspire, challenge and encourage each other, while providing extensive value for our customers.
   

  

**W H A T W E N E E D 🙏🏻**
 We are looking for a
 **Microsoft 365 Developer** 
 to join our
 **Information Management** 
**Team** 
 at Xenit. Here you will act as a senior member of the team; developing features and frameworks, assisting with code reviews, promoting best practices and supporting junior developers. It's important that you are a team player and are passionate about sharing your knowledge with others.
   

  

**C O U L D Y O U B E A M A T C H ?**
**We Believe Our Next Colleague Has**
* 5+ years working as a full-stack developer within Microsoft Azure, Microsoft 365, SharePoint OnPrem, Azure AD, Cognitive Search and Graph.


 (including specific experience in
 **.NET for web applications and APIs** 
 ).
   

  

* Solid experience in developing hybrid solutions based on M365/Azure/SharePoint
* Experience with developing solutions based on Microsoft 365 where logic/code runs in Azure, e.g. Webhooks in Azure Functions.
* Experience with development of solutions based on SharePoint OnPrem where logic/code is run locally.
* Experience working with DevOps.
* Good knowledge of SharePoint Framework (SPFx), CSOM, React, TypeScript and Fluent UI, CSS and SASS.
* Documented experience with App Services, Azure Functions, Logic Apps, etc.
* Fluent in spoken and written Swedish and English.


**It Is a Bonus If You Have**
* Experience with the development of solutions based on the Microsoft Purview Information Protection and Purview Information Governance concepts.
* Experience with the development of Document Management Solutions (ECM) based on Microsoft SharePoint Online and on-prem.
* Experience with the development of solutions that include lifecycle management of collaboration surfaces, information, accounts and authorizations.
* Completed relevant courses or gained certifications.


**We Also Believe That You Are a Person Who**
* Acts on their own initiative, makes things happen and takes responsibility for their work
* Has a methodical and structured way of working
* Can understand/analyze complex issues quickly
* Collaborates effectively with others and builds good relationships with both customers and colleagues
* Fluent in spoken and written Swedish and English
* Above all else, displays kindness and compassion in everything they do 💕


**W H Y C H O O S E X E N I T ?**
**Benefits 🎁**
 Xenit boasts a large benefits package, including but not limited to, a wellness allowance, health insurance, föräldralön bonus, ergonomic workplaces, recruitment bonuses, weekly employee surveys, etc.
   

  

**Super interesting colleagues 🎉**
 With us you will find spinning instructors, parkour practitioners, gamers, art historians, rugby players, puzzle maniacs, film geeks and much more.
   

  

 With us, you are free to be who you are. Our workforce is so diverse, that one of the only things each person has in common is an incredible drive and passion for what they do.
   

  

**Activities ⛹🏻**
 Each quarter, we have
 **Xenit Inspire** 
 where employees are able to share specialist knowledge, information about cool projects, and take part in tasks centered around innovation - workshops and hackathons. We also offer annual conferences, team building and other group activities such as basketball, Gothenburg Lap, yoga and Power Walk.
   

  

 Xenit was also recently awarded
 **"Career Company of 2024"** 
 . This prestigious recognition underscores our commitment to fostering a workplace culture that values inclusivity, well-being, and growth.
   

  

*"Xenit is an outstanding employer where corporate culture and well-being are at the center. Here, the employees are part of a warm and inclusive community where their well-being and well-being are prioritized. By offering an environment where collaboration, creativity and innovation are encouraged, employees can thrive and develop while contributing to the company's success."*
 Read more about Karriar Företagen here.
   

  

*Application information may be shared, in some instances, within the co-native group.*
 If you have questions about the position or the recruitment process, you are welcome to contact our Head of Talent: Abigail Chapman 💌
   

  

 Read more here: https://xenit.se/
   

  

 Xenit's goal is not only to become Sweden's leading cloud partner, but to be Sweden's kindest cloud partner.
   

  

 Our theory is that satisfied workers produce satisfying work, and so we aim to create a working environment in which our employees can thrive; working independently, flexibly and happily.
   

  

 We are happy with hybrid remote working, encourage collaboration between offices and freedom in choosing devices/equipment and working hours.
   

  

 Why not find out more about us?
   

  

*Welcome to Xenit!*

title: AI Full-stack Developer
description:
Are you looking for a role within an exciting world of AI technologies, where you can both contribute with your expertise and keep on developing?
   

  

 We are starting a new chapter within ASSA ABLOY’s organization, and we are looking for top talent to help us grow our AI Technical Development Teams from scratch.
   

  

 Join our Team in Stockholm, Sweden and enjoy a collaborative culture that empowers you to build a career you can be proud of.
   

  

**What Would You Do As Our AI Full-stack Developer**
 You would be a leading AI Full-stack Developer in our new project that deals with AI Technical Development, working with our new Team of Engineers in Stockholm. We have cross-functional teams that create modern, secure and high-quality solutions. We develop embedded applications and connect them with Mobile Applications, Electronic Access Control software using cloud and microservice architecture.
   

  

**You would also:**
* Stay up-to-date with the latest AI technologies.
* Be responsible for hands-on RND Development, including Cloud development, DevOps, Databases, ensuring security.
* Interact with tech - and non-tech stakeholders.


**The Skills And Experience You Need**
 We are looking for someone who:
   

  

* has previous experience with backend and fronted development of applications and cloud infrastructure.
* understands AI solutions, knows how to use them.
* has experience with data bases and security solutions.
* has experience for working in a DevOps team, within an agile environment.
* Is fluent in English, spoken and written.


 Our code is written in Python – hands-on experience with Python will be beneficial, but isn’t a must-have.
   

  

**We review applications regularly, so don’t wait**
 We are building diverse, inclusive teams, and encourage applications from everyone who can see themselves working with us. Just set up your profile and apply here.
   

  

 To make sure your personal data is safe, we don’t look at any applications sent by email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the process, email Khalil Khabakibi, Talent Acquisition Business Partner, at khalil.kabakibi@assaabloy.com.
   

  

 Let’s create a safer and more open world - together!
   

  

 To find out more about us, visit www.assaabloy.com
   

  

**We are the ASSA ABLOY Group**
 Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 61,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
   

  

 As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.
   

  

 As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

title: Communication Specialist to Xylem
description:
Join Xylem as a Communication Specialist passionate about water infrastructure! Craft compelling content for digital and printed materials, manage social media channels and deep dive into product positioning. Embrace innovation in a collaborative environment. Apply now!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**Company :**
 Xylem Water Solutions Global Services AB
 



  

**City :**
 Sundbyberg
 



  

**Job Category :**
 Marketing / Information / Media
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time, consulting assignment 1 year
 



  

**Start date :**
 ASAP/ according to the agreement
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
   




**About the role**

 As a Communication Specialist consultant at Xylem you will responsible for product content creation as well as driving global social media channels for Flygt and Godwin, some of our largest wastewater management and dewatering product brands. This role is made for you if you are a creative individual passionate about driving innovation within the water infrastructure sector. It's advantageous if you enjoy learning about technology and share our excitement for advancing the water sector.
 


  


 In this role, flexibility is key as you'll handle diverse tasks beyond social media management. You will, for example, lead communication initiatives to create internal awareness on our product launches, and collaborate with product management to create engaging marketing materials. Furthermore, you'll optimize user experience with our web content, and collaborate with international teams to enhance brand visibility and engagement.
 


  


  

**We assume you are curious to get to know Xylem better? You can do that easily by watching this video:**



  

  


 Xylem has also won several different awards, one of which is the "guldknappen", where they have been named Sweden's most parent-friendly workplace, as they work to ensure that their employees can combine work life with private life.
   




**Work tasks**

 Through the link, you can review an example of what the team at Xylem is working on today:
   

**Flygt Concertor XPC**



  

  
* Collaborate with product management and engineering to understand and be able to communicate our products’ unique features, benefits, and outcomes.
  
* Develop and distribute content on Flygt and Godwin social media channels, especially YouTube and LinkedIn, and optimize these channels for better search rankings.
  
* Ensure the functionality and efficiency of all Flygt and Godwin websites referenced in social media.
  
* Lead the development of our internal SharePoint portal for product launches.
  
* Adhere to Xylem’s brand guidelines across social media and product marketing materials and support the development and execution of product launch plans.
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* 2-3 years proven experience in social media management and content marketing, with focus on video creation and editing.
  
* Familiarity with SEO, especially YouTube SEO.
  
* Bachelor’s degree in communications or marketing studies.
  
* Proficiency in video editing tool management.
  
* Excellent communication skills in English, both oral and written.
  


  


  

**It is meritorious if you have**



  

  
* Experience working in international B2B technical companies.
  
* Proficiency in graphic design software.
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**



  

  
* Analytical mindset
  
* Problem-solving
  
* Proactivity
  
* Flexibility
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Lina Ericsson or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on sth1@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15105904

title: Marketing Specialist Student Assistant
description:
✨ Join us in creating a happier world! ✨
 



 We believe work should be fun, and you should feel excited to get to work on Mondays. Our attitude towards work is why we got elected Iceland's second Greatest Place to Work in 2023.
 



  





 If you are the kind of person who can't help but make everyday things more fun, and you live in Stockholm, we may be looking for you!
 



  





 Smitten is pioneering a new era in how single people lead their lives. Smitten is on a mission to create a happier world, bringing happy daters together with a fun and creative approach to online dating.
 



  





 While talent is a close second, we hire for cultural fit first. We believe the key to success is how we communicate with each other, internally and externally. Communication is an enormous part of our company culture and product. While you don't have to be a people-skills expert when you join Smitten, you will grow to become exceptional at giving and receiving feedback, taking responsibility, feeling empathy, etc.
 



  





 You may be a team fit if you:
 


* Have a deep, almost bizarre, passion for your work
* Are confident in your skillset
* Have great communication skills
* Have an extraordinarily high standard to do a good job
* Have a creative mindset
* Believe life and work should be an incredible, fun experience



 Does your gut tell you you want to work with us? If yes, keep reading; if no, that's alright; we are not everyone's type.
 



  





 Skills and relevant experiences:
 



 Are you a motivated individual with a passion for digital content creation, guerrilla marketing, and events?
 



 We are currently looking for a dynamic and talented individual fluent in Danish to join our team and bring a fresh perspective to our marketing efforts. In this role, you will have the opportunity to create compelling content, expand our TikTok presence, organize exciting events, and engage in various guerrilla marketing activities.
 


* Creative content creation: Develop a strong sense of creativity and the ability to generate unique ideas for TikTok videos. Stay updated with the latest trends, challenges, and viral content on the platform to keep your content relevant and engaging.
* Consistency and Persistence: Building a successful TikTok presence requires consistent effort and persistence. Post regularly, engage with your audience, and continuously improve your content to maximize your chances of success.
* Analytics and insights: Learn how to analyze TikTok's analytics to understand your audience, track the performance of your content, and identify trends that resonate with your viewers. This data will help you refine your content strategy and make data-driven decisions.
* Collaboration: Explore opportunities for collaborations with other TikTok creators or brands. Collaborations can expand reach, introduce you to new audiences, and provide valuable networking opportunities.
* Guerrilla Marketing: You love thinking outside the box and coming up with guerrilla marketing tactics that turn heads. You know how to create buzz and get people talking about your brand in unconventional and exciting ways.
* Event Planning: You've got the skills to plan and organize marketing events that leave a lasting impression. From speed dating events to festival activities, you know how to handle all the logistics and make sure everything runs smoothly.



  





 We believe work should be fun, and it should support, even supercharge your personal and professional growth. You will have semi-flexible working hours.
 



  





 For more information, contact Karen - Karen@smitten.fun

title: Lead Generation Specialist
description:
**Om rollen**




  





 Nemely AB söker en driven och målmedveten Lead Generation Specialist till vårt säljteam i Stockholm. Din roll kommer att vara fokuserad kring att identifiera och bearbeta nya leads och vara med att ta fram väldefinierade prospektlistor genom en blandning av kalla och varma samtal och genom andra sälj- och marknadskanaler. Du kommer att jobba nära vår Chief Commercial Officer och andra inom sälj- och marknadsteamet såväl som vår VD för att hjälpa till att driva bolagets säljaktiviteter framåt. Vi på Nemely har stora tillväxtambitioner inför framtiden, och vi vill att du har minst lika stora ambitioner och är ivrig, samt tar eget ansvar och initiativ för optimal effektivitet!
 



  





**Dagliga ansvarsområden**




  




* Ansvara för lead-generering, prospektering med stort fokus på utgående samtal mot primärt nya kunder.
* Vara med och påverka hur vi ska maximera vår lead-generering
* Delta aktivt på interna säljmöten för uppföljning av utförda aktiviteter.
* Hitta och analysera bolag som är relevanta för bearbetning, samt importera leadslistor till vårt CRM.
* Boka kvalificerade kundmöten till våra säljare.
* Underhålla och uppdatera bolagets interna CRM-system med relevanta notering, leadsinformation, bokade möten och prospekt.
* Besvara telefonsamtal och e-mail avseende säljförfrågningar på ett professionellt, vänligt och effektivt sätt.



  





**Vi söker dig som**




  




* Har minst 1-2 års erfarenhet inom sälj eller mötesbokning
* Kund- och serviceorienterad med ett trevligt bemötande både fysiskt och digitalt.
* Kan ha en konstruktiv och intresseväckande dialog med beslutsfattare hos potentiella kunder.
* Har goda kunskaper inom Office-paketet och en vana av att jobba i ett strukturerat CRM-system (Microsoft Dynamics är meriterande).
* Har dokumenterade resultat att generera leads och uppnå utsatta säljmål



  





**Meriterande**




  




* Erfarenhet inom B2B lead-generering








**Datorvana**




  





 Arbetskunskaper inom Microsoft Office (Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint), affärsinformationstjänster och erfarenhet av CRM-system. Dynamics 365 och/eller Salesforce är ett plus.
 



  





**Ledarskapsbeteende är starkt meriterande**




  




* LED MED EXEMPEL: Var någon andra kan räkna med, visa andra vad du kan göra, och de kommer att följa. Var den som sticker ut, inte den som passar in.



  




* DRA ANDRA MED DIG: Det är alltid viktigt att hjälpa andra att växa och uppnå framgångar i ett team, inte bara skapar du värde utan blir en coach och lärare för din omgivning.



  




* AGERA SOM EN ÄGARE: Leverera resultat, var stolta över att ge värde åt ditt företags varumärke, anställda, kunder, nyckelägare och ta personligt ansvar. Var stolt över dina prestationer.



  





**Företaget**




  





 Nemely är ett IT -konsultföretag som fokuserar på att implementera CRM-strategier och lösningar. Baserat på processkartläggning och effektivisering, och genom partnerskap med branschledande systemleverantörer, erbjuder Nemely smarta kundrelationslösningar som förbättrar användarens produktivitet och effektivitet med fokus på användbarhet och tillgänglighet.
 



  





 Nemely har framgångsrikt implementerat CRM-lösningar för alla storlekar av företag från små företag till stora globala företag. Med erfarenhet från flera branscher och vertikaler hjälper Nemely organisationen med allt från digitalisering och förändringshantering till lösningsdesign. utveckling och genomförande. Våra kundreferenser inkluderar Scania, Swedish Match, SignUp och andra. Läs mer om våra erbjudanden på nemely.com.
 



  





**Förmåner för dig som arbetar på Nemely**




  





 När du går med i Nemely kan du förvänta dig att generöst belönas för allt ditt hårda arbete. Du kommer också att ha rätt till ett brett utbud av förmåner för att stödja dina behov och livsstil. Vi tror att hårt arbete bör löna sig och hjälpa dig att upprätthålla en hälsosam och givande livsstil, inklusive:
 



  




* Kontinuerligt lärande, professionell utveckling och tillväxtmöjligheter.
* Avslappnad atmosfär i en flexibel arbetsmiljö.
* Konkurrenskraftigt löne- och förmånspaket; inklusive privat sjukförsäkring, livförsäkring, pension och månatligt gymmedlemskap.
* Betald ledig dag på din födelsedag.
* Möjlighet att växa till en chefsposition.



  





 Läs mer om våra förmåner på vår hemsida

title: Sales Representative
description:
**Vi letar efter dig som är i början av din karriär och vill utvecklas inom försäljning - på ett riktigt roligt bolag. Vår ambition är att bli Europas bästa mobiloperatör för företag! Vill du vara med? 🚀**
**Detta Är Rollen För Dig Som**
* Är peppad på att starta din säljkarriär
* Är resultatfokuserad, nyfiken och driftig
* ... och längtar efter att vara en del av ett ambitiöst och roligt bolag med spännande utvecklingsmöjligheter!


**Om jobbet 💻📱**
 I rollen som Sales Representative blir du en nyckelspelare till vårt team i Stockholm. Du kommer att ansvara för nykundsbearbetning inom SME och Mid Market segmentet, vilket innebär att du kommer bidra till att utöka Telavox kundbas och sälja in vår fantastiska lösning till företagskunder i storleken 20-350 anställda.
   

  

 Du kommer främst fokusera på de initiala delarna av försäljningsprocessen, vilket innefattar prospektering och mötesbokning, och med tiden driva dina egna försäljningsprocesser från start till signerat avtal!
   

  

 Till din hjälp i rollen har du CRM-system (vi jobbar i HubSpot) och ett hjälpsamt, härligt och erfaret team! Som ny hos oss får du omfattande utbildningarna via Telavox Academy, samt en Telavox-Buddy som blir din go-to person under onboardingen och kommer se till att du får bästa möjliga stöd för att lyckas i rollen!
   

  

 Vi hoppas på att du kommer vilja stanna länge hos oss, och med det sagt finns det goda möjligheter att ta sig an större ansvar och utvecklas i din säljkarriär.
   

  

***Läs gärna mer om Telavox & Gabriel, som är rekryterande chef i denna rekrytering, på följande länk: Meet the Telavoxer***
**Om dig 🌟**
 För att lyckas (och trivas!) i den här rollen har du nyligen slutat studera och vill börja din säljkarriär, eller så har du några års erfarenhet av försäljning eller kundservice och vill vidareutvecklas hos oss! Du drivs av att hitta nya försäljningsmöjligheter, både kalla & varma och är således inte rädd för att lyfta luren!
   

  

 Du har även ett stort intresse för teknik, samt en förståelse för vad som är värdeskapande för både din kund och dig själv.
   

  

**Vidare Ser Vi Gärna Att Du Har**
* Erfarenhet av uppsökande försäljning eller mötesbokning, gärna mot B2B men även B2C är meriterande.
* Relevant utbildning inom försäljning, alternativt motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
* Lätt för att lära dig ny teknik och komplexa lösningar


 Men det viktigaste är att du som person är nyfiken och har ett driv att ständigt lära dig nya saker och bygga nya relationer - både internt och externt! Vi tror att att ha roligt på jobbet är nyckeln till framgång, och vill fortsätta växa med nya kollegor som bidrar med nya perspektiv och massor av positiv energi!
   

  

**Vi är Telavox - mer än bara prat 💚**
 För snart 20 år sedan fick två Lundastudenter samma entreprenöriella tanke: “Det måste finnas ett bättre sätt. Ett bättre, mer naturligt sätt för företag att kommunicera på”. En av studenterna var Viktor, VD och grundare av Telavox. Där och då började idén om Telavox! Idag är vi en digital mobiloperatör som erbjuder telefoni, växeltjänst, chatt, möten och kontaktcenter - i en och samma plattform som vi dessutom utvecklat helt själva! Vi +500 anställda i tio länder, och hej vad det går!
   

  

**Är du intresserad av att bli en del av Telavox? 🥳**
 Skicka din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Om det finns några frågor, vänligen kontakta rekryterare Hanna Lindkvist på Hanna.Lindkvist@telavox.com eller rekryterande chef Gabriel Abou Khalil på Gabriel.Aboukhalil@telavox.se. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Learn more about what we do! ⬇️**
 Telavox develops world-leading communications platforms with solutions for smart and efficient telephony, PBX, chat and much more. Regardless of whether it involves an entrepreneur-driven startup or a giant among giants, Telavox contributes to making companies more transparent, efficient and accessible.

title: Data Engineers till Stockholm
description:
Data Engineer till Stockholm som vill lösa uppgifter genom modern teknik, tillsammans med ett stort nätverk Data- och Analysexperter.
   

  

*Är du en erfaren Dataingenjör, BI-utvecklare/BI-konsult eller ETL-utvecklare? Drömmer du om att fortsätta din professionella resa tillsammans med ett team kunniga kollegor? Motiveras du av att arbeta med moderna teknologier och lösa problem för kunder inom olika branscher kan DU vara vår nästa Dataingenjör!*
 På Solita handlar allt om att förbättra företag och forma en ljusare framtid genom att dra nytta av kraften av data i vår uppkopplade värld. Tänk dig detta: våra kunder sträcker sig över alla olika branscher och områden, vi finns överallt! Som ett sammanhållet team av IT-experter är vi för närvarande 1700 personer spridda över sex länder. I Sverige arbetar våra dataexperter med en stor och mångsidig projektpool där de bygger datamodeller, skapar innovativa dataplattformar och skapar molnbaserade datapipelines, samt mycket mer!
   

  

**Träffa en Solitan**
 Möt
 **Clara Lundström,** 
 en Data Engineer här på Solita. Hon arbetar i ett projekt för ett globalt företag inom facility service, det största i Norden. Clara, tillsammans med ett team av Solita-entusiaster, belyser datalandskapet och använder data från olika källor för att skapa visualiseringar. Erfaren med molnverktyg arbetar hon med data, automation och transformation.
   

  

*“Att arbeta som konsult på Solita är varierat samtidigt som du har tillgång till ett stort nätverk av experter inom många olika områden. Det ger utmärkta möjligheter att utvecklas i din roll, vare sig det handlar om att bredda dina kunskaper eller specialisera dig. Anledningen till att jag trivs så bra på Solita är den vänliga, stödjande och opretentiösa atmosfären.”*
**Hur är det att jobba på Solita?**
 Solitas företagskultur är annorlunda många andra företags, den handlar om autonomi, att stötta och växa tillsammans med våra kollegor samt att leva våra värdeord – passion, courage, easy-going och caring.
   

  

 Rent konkret innebär det ett företag som har genomtänkta interna tillväxtvägar, att det finns spännande kundprojekt och erfarna kollegor som är omtänksamma och passionerade. Du kommer också få chansen att arbeta med en stor bredd av projekt och branscher där du stöttar och hjälper kund med faktiska affärspåverkande beslut som lämnar avtryck och består. Utöver detta har vi även partnerskap med en mängd tech-företag såsom, GCP, AWS, Snowflake för att nämna några.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 På Solita värdesätter vi att du har erfarenhet av teknik och kommunikation på både svenska och engelska. Tekniska förmågor som ETL/ELT, python, SQL, DBT, Snowflake och verktyg inom orkestrering samt datamodellering och datawarehousing är något som ofta används i det dagliga arbetet. Våra kunder arbetar ofta i cloud-miljöer så kunskap i tekniker som Azure, GCP och AWS behövs. Om du kan något visualiseringsverktyg är även det ett plus i kanten, gärna PowerBI eller Tableau.
   

  

 Som konsult på Solita handlar arbetet inte bara om det tekniska – att kommunicera med kund i förklaring av tekniska lösningar, tolkande av deras behov och att hantera potentiella problem du kommer få hantera så vana med att kommunicera med stakeholders och kunder är en bra erafarenhet. Vi arbetar autonomt på Solita, så att vara van att diktera och planera upp sitt arbete självständigt behövs.
   

  

**En Dag På Solita**
 En dag på Solita kan ofta starta med ett standup-möte med kund och dina team-medlemmar, där ni stämmer av agendan för dagen för veckan. Sen kliver du in i ditt kodnära arbete: byggande av data pipelines, programmering i python/SQL, arbete med data och byggande i cloud. Under dagen kan det dyka upp ad-hoc möten med kund, kollegor som behöver stöttning eller helt enkelt att du lyssnar på våra interna utbildningsmöten; infosessions, som kan handla om allt relaterat till Solita och branschen. Dagen fortsätter ofta med det kod nära arbetet, möten med kollegor och kund och inte minst – fika!
   

  

 Du kan även ha interna projekt såsom att köra en dragning på vår Data Academy eller annat på din to-do list!
   

  

 Do you want to learn more about what it is like working at Solita as a Data Engineer? Read more about Lisa and her Story here! https://www.solita.fi/blogs/people-of-solita-lisa-kyhlberg-senior-data-engineer/
   

  

**Intresserad?**
 Vid frågor; kontakta jacob.beck(at)solita.se eller ansök här. Du kan också connecta med Jacob på LinkedIn på https://www.linkedin.com/in/jacob-beck-/. Vi uppskattar dina färdigheter, men vi är också ivriga att lära oss om essensen i din motivation och hur du ser din tillväxt framför dig. Dela ditt CV nedan så återkommer vi så fort vi kan!

title: Verksamhetsutvecklare inom logistik
description:
**Solna**
 Har du ett genuint intresse för problemlösning och förbättringar? Har du dessutom en bakgrund inom logistik och vill bidra till utvecklingen av karoliska sjukhuset? Sök då tjänsten som verksamhetsutvecklare inom logistik hos oss på Coor.
   

  

**Vilka är vi?**
 Coor har den stora äran att få bidra till det viktiga arbete som dagligen sker på Karolina sjukhuset. Vi levererar en mängd tjänster där bland annat lokalvård, restaurang, telefoni, reception, fastighetsskötsel och andra tekniska tjänster ingår. Vi är väldigt duktiga på det vi gör men vi vill bli ännu bättre och därför söker vi en stjärna som vill vara med och utveckla verksamheten.
   

  

**Vad kommer du att få göra?**
 I rollen som verksamhetsutvecklare inom logistik kommer du att vara höger handen till sitechefen inom Logistik och delta i arbete att kontinuerligt utveckla processer och system för att öka effektivitet, kvalitet och kundnöjdhet. Du kommer att ingå i logistiks ledningsgrupp och jobba nära verksamheten och stötta dem med utveckla nya tjänster, delta/driva lokala projekt kring processer, arbetssätt, uppföljning, förbättringsarbete, avvikelsehantering och rutiner.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter inkluderar bland annat:
   

  

* Säkerställa att våra systemlösningar supporterar och möjliggör vårt åtagande till kund, verksamhetens krav och mål.
* Identifiera behov och utveckla nya processer, flöden och rutiner genom täta samarbeten med kollegor, kunder och leverantörer. Detta innefattar analyser, förstudier, funktionsbeskrivningar samt driva och genomföra projekt.
* Skapa, följa upp, utvärdera och analysera olika nyckeltal och rapporter för att stödja verksamhetens beslut och identifiera förbättringsområden.
* Dokumentera införda lösningar och förslag till förbättringar.
* Tillsammans med sitechef ta fram kostnadsförslag för nya tjänster.


**Anställning** 
 : Tillsvidare på 100% med provanställning på 6 månader
   

  

**Placering** 
 : Solna
   

  

**Arbetstid** 
 : Vardagar
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som:
   

  

* Har ett starkt intresse för IT och systemlösningar
* Har relevant utbildning inom logistik eller tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta med utveckling av logistikprocesser
* Är skicklig i att använda Office-paketet med mycket goda kunskaper i framförallt Excel och gärna Power BI, QlikSense och Power Apps
* Har goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska


**Din personlighet:**
 För oss är din personlighet viktigaste och vi ser gärna att du:
   

  

* Är en analytisk person med genuint intresse för problemlösning och förbättringar.
* Är driven, tålmodig och flexibel och inte rädd för att ta tag i uppgifter.
* Du arbetar strukturerat och fokuserat och har en god förmåga att arbeta med komplexa frågor.
* Ha en positiv inställning.
* Du kan kommunicera och visualisera problem samt lösningar för andra på ett enkelt och tydligt sätt.
* Du är serviceinriktad, uppvisar engagemang och innovation samt målmedvetenhet.


**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
* En kreativ arbetsmiljö där du får mycket utrymme och kommer att spela en nyckelroll i driva arbetet kring logistikutveckling på Karolinska sjukhuset
* Möjlighet att påverka Coors digitaliseringsresa och göra skillnad för våra chefer och medarbetare.
* En prestigelös kultur med stort affärsmannaskap, delegerat ansvar och mycket gemenskap.
* Kompetens- och karriärsutveckling inom ett expansivt företag..
* Möjlighet att arbeta på ett av Europas modernaste sjukhus


**Övrig information och kontaktuppgifter**
* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande så sök redan idag!.
* Vi genomför bakgrundskontroller på all vår personal vid anställning. Vill du veta mer, läs här: https://www.coor.se/karriar/rekryteringsprocessen/
* Vid frågor, kontakta rekryterande chef Magnus Rudman på magnus.rudman@coor.com.

title: Lokalförvaltare med stor erfarenhet till förvaltningssektionen, placering Stockholm
description:
Arbetsplatsbeskrivning
   

  

**Är du redo för en större uppgift? Vi söker nu lokalförvaltare med intresse och kunskap för förvaltning som utmärker sig genom sina samarbets- samt problemlösande förmågor. Vill du få utlopp för dessa har vi jobbet för dig. Hos oss kommer du tillsammans med engagerade och trevliga kollegor utvecklas och få erfarenheter för livet, samtidigt som ditt arbete bidrar till att öka tryggheten och minska brottsligheten i Sverige.**
 Polismyndigheten är inne i en expansiv fas, därför behöver nya polisstationer byggas och standarden på flera lokaler höjas. Myndigheten äger inte några lokaler utan hyr istället cirka 1,5 miljoner kvadratmeter.
   

  

 Lokalförsörjningsenhetens uppdrag är att säkerställa att myndigheten har ändamålsenliga lokaler på kort och lång sikt. Lokalförsörjningsenheten finns i hela landet och består av tre sektioner: förvaltning, projekt och utveckling.
   

  

 Fastighetsförvaltningssektionen ansvarar för drift och underhåll i befintligt lokalbestånd och har kontinuerlig dialog med hyresvärdar och polisens verksamheter som använder lokalerna. Sektionen är organiserad i sju grupper: Syd, Väst, Öst, Stockholm, Bergslagen, Nord och Mitt. Grupperna ansvarar för respektive geografiskt område vilket också inkluderar nationella avdelningar.
   

  

 Lokalförsörjningsenheten är en del av Polismyndighetens ekonomiavdelning.
   

  

 Läs mer om ekonomiavdelningen.
   

  

 Arbetsbeskrivning
   

  

 Som lokalförvaltare säkerställer du att lokalerna är verksamhetsanpassade och kostnadseffektiva avseende ditt lokalbestånd. Du ansvarar för att förvalta, samordna och utveckla befintligt lokalbestånd.
   

  

 Rollen innebär många kontaktytor och du samarbetar med såväl andra lokalförvaltare, fastighetsstrateger, projektledare som jurister och ramavtalsleverantörer. Du samarbetar vidare med inköps- och serviceenheten, IT-avdelningen och säkerhetsavdelningen. Som lokalförvaltare agerar du kravställare gentemot hyresvärdar och leverantörer samt har en god dialog och bygger långsiktiga relationer med övriga interna verksamheter.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifter är i huvudsak följande, men andra uppgifter kan också förekomma:
   

  

* Utifrån hyresgästperspektiv säkerställa lokalerna är verksamhetsanpassade
* Arbeta i budget- och uppföljningsarbetet avseende ditt lokalbestånd
* Driva mindre investeringsinitiativ samt delta i projektgrupper vid större ombyggnationer/ lokalanpassningar
* Offertframtagning, kostnadsuppskattningar och avrop från ramavtalsleverantörer
* Framtagandet av hyres- och serviceavtal
* Besvara lokalförsörjningsfrågor samt agera rådgivande gentemot verksamheten
* Arbeta för att lagstiftning och arbetsmiljökrav uppfylls i lokalbeståndet, i samråd och med stöd från verksamheten


 Resor ingår i arbetet, främst inom region Stockholm men kan förekomma även nationellt.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer
   

  

**Detta är en möjlighet för dig som har:**
* Yrkes- och/ eller akademisk utbildning (t.ex. teknisk förvaltare, fastighetsingenjör) alternativt annan utbildning kombinerad med relevant erfarenhet som arbetsgivaren bedömer som likvärdig
* Mångårig erfarenhet från en liknande roll, exempelvis som förvaltare eller motsvarande som arbetsgivaren bedömer relevant
* B-körkort
* Mycket god förmåga att uttrycka dig på svenska, såväl i tal som i skrift


**Vi ser det som meriterande om du utöver ovan även har:**
* Erfarenhet av projektledning, framförallt mindre ombyggnationer/lokalanpassningar
* Erfarenhet av byggentreprenader
* Goda kunskaper och erfarenhet av hyres- och serviceavtal
* Erfarenhet av fastighetssystem
* Erfarenhet och kunskap av LOU
* Goda IT- kunskaper, exempelvis av Officepaketet
* Goda ekonomiska kunskaper, företrädesvis inom inköp, budgetering, upphandling eller motsvarande


 Då anställningen är placerad i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap.
   

  

**Personliga egenskaper**
 Arbetsuppgifterna ställer krav på att du tycker om att ge god service, är relationsskapande och självständigt driver arbetet framåt med fokus på att lösa problem. Du är flexibel, har förmåga att omprioritera i arbetet vid behov och trivs i en miljö med högt tempo där den ena dagen inte är den andra lik. Vidare är du en god kommunikatör och trivs med att samarbeta samt har en solidarisk inställning till de beslut som fattas. Utöver det ställer rollen krav på att du är strukturerad och noggrann. Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Kontaktpersoner
   

  

 Har du frågor om uppdraget är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Peter Ekberg, peter.ekberg@polisen.se
   

  

 Undrar du något om rekryteringsprocessen kontakta ansvarig HR-konsult Kimberly Uvelid, kimberly.uvelid@polisen.se
   

  

 Fackliga företrädare
   

  

 Polisförbundet, Sofia Ask, tfn: 010-563 87 10
   

  

 SACO, nås via Polisens växel 114 14
   

  

 SEKO Polisen, Karna Tillheden, tfn: 010-561 66 27
   

  

 ST, nås via Polisens växel 114 14
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning med provanställning om sex månader
   

  

 Arbetsort: Stockholm
   

  

 Arbetstid: Heltid, Flextid
   

  

 Funktion: Lokalförvaltare
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Från och med maj 2024 använder vi inte personligt brev i våra rekryteringsprocesser. Vi ber dig istället att bifoga ditt CV där du tydligt beskriver på vilket sätt du uppfyller efterfrågade kvalifikationer och meriter kopplat till aktuell rekrytering. Du kan se den kompletta kravprofilen i jobbannonsen.
   

  

**Utöver CV behöver du även besvara ett antal urvalsfrågor som en del av din ansökan. Dessa frågor utgår från aktuell kravprofil och att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.**
 Vänligen notera att eventuella krav ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället. De uppgifter du lämnar i samband med din ansökan kan användas för att kontakta dig, få information och kallelser samt eventuella anställningshandlingar.
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan i form av CV och enkät (pdf, 273 kB) via e-post till jobb.na@polisen.se senast den 23 september 2024.** 
 Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via den mailadress som anges i annonsen.
 **Märk din ansökan med referensnummer A501.522/2024 i mailets ärendemening.**
 Har du skyddade personuppgifter, referenser eller liknande information som du själv bedömer som skyddsvärd rekommenderar vi att du kontaktar ansvarig HR-konsult innan du går vidare med din ansökan.
   

  

 En anställning hos Polismyndigheten kan komma att inledas med en provanställning om sex månader.
   

  

 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) genomförs innan beslut om anställning fattas. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. Läs mer om krigsplacering och säkerhetsprövning under https://polisen.se/krigsplacering och https://polisen.se/sakerhetsprovning
   

  

 Polismyndigheten kommer att behandla dina personuppgifter i enlighet med reglerna i EU:s dataskyddsförordning (2016/679) och annan tillämplig dataskyddsreglering. Läs mer om vår hantering av personuppgifter på https://polisen.se/personuppgifter/rekrytering
   

  

 Din ansökan är en offentlig handling enligt offentlighetsprincipen.
   

  

**Polismyndigheten**
 Polismyndigheten erbjuder dig en arbetsplats som stimulerar till mångfald, kreativitet och personlig utveckling. Läs gärna om våra förmåner som anställd hos polisen på https://polisen.se/erbjudande
   

  

 Vi bedriver vår verksamhet enligt vår värdegrund: engagemang, effektivitet och tillgänglighet. Som medarbetare inom polisen agerar du för likabehandling. Det är en förutsättning för rättssäkerhet, rättstrygghet och för polisens legitimitet i samhället. Som företrädare för polisen respekterar du allas lika värde och skapar förtroende för polisen.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om polisen och vår verksamhet på www.polisen.se
   

 www.polisen.se
   

  

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!**
 Sök jobbet
   

  

 Ansök via e-post

title: Financial Planning and Analysis analyst
description:
Do you have previous experience as an FP&A Analyst, are analytical, and enjoy working with numbers? Take the opportunity to become a part of a global biopharmaceutical company. Apply today, we work with ongoing selection!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 Finance / Law / Purchase
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time, (Sept. 2024 – Sept 2025)
 



  

**Start date :**
 As soon as possible
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
   




**About the role**

 Our client is a global biopharmaceutical company that develops and manufactures medications to treat various serious diseases. Their mission is to discover and deliver innovative medicines and solutions that solve serious health issues today and address the medical challenges of tomorrow. They strive to have a remarkable impact on people's lives across several key therapeutic areas – immunology, oncology, neuroscience, and eye care.
 


  


 As an FP&A Analyst, you will provide expert analysis of key financials, including sales, expenses, and other KPIs, driving business growth through data-driven insights. Collaborating closely with the controller and talented finance team (2 persons), you will contribute to accurate planning, reporting, and decision-making processes, shaping the success of our affiliate and strengthening our relationship with area headquarters.
 


  


 This is a consulting assignment through us at Academic Work during parental leave of one FP&A analyst (Sept. 2024 – Sept 2025).
 


  


  

**Location:**
 Flexible – ideally fully on site in Stockholm, but can also be remote within Sweden, with regular (monthly) travel to Stockholm office.
   




**Work tasks**
  
* Being a key participant in all planning cycles for the affiliate, such as Annual Plan, Long Range Plan (LRP) and Monthly LBE (Last Best Estimate)
  
* Analyzing variances between planned expenses and actual outcome and suggest corrective actions together with business partners
  
* Business Partner for selected departments and/or Commercial teams
  
* Prepare and review Quarter End Close activities (accruals and contracts revision) and monthly reporting
  
* Prepare and consolidate monthly S&OP (Sales and Operations Planning - a process that involves aligning sales, demand, and supply plan)
  
* Administration, development, and support of various planning & reporting systems (IBM Analytics, PowerBI, …) Involvement in projects (financial, other)
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* Master of Science in Business Administration or similar qualification
  
* 4-5 years of finance experience (FP&A, Accounting)
  
* Strong technical skills for working in different systems
  
* Advanced Excel skills is mandatory and your expertise in data analytics will be highly valued
  
* Fluent in English and other Scandinavian language (preferred)
   

 Knowledge can be gained through education, experience or self-taught.
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**



  

  
* Strong analytical skills with a keen interest for working with numbers and databases
  
* Team player with good communication skills
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Linnea Molnar or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on stv5@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15106758

title: Technical Account Manager - Nordics
description:
**About Proxify** 




  





 Proxify is Europe’s largest network of deeply vetted software engineers. We drive tech success by bridging the talent gap. Our mission is to connect the world’s best developers with the opportunities they deserve. We partner with more than 2000 companies in 30 different countries, ranging from SaaS startups, Fintech, and Deeptech companies within AI to established enterprises within Media, Electronics, and Finance.
 



  





**Are you a true relationship builder with a strong understanding of sales, technology, people, and business? Do you have tech skills and a solid background in sales?** 




  





 We're on the lookout for a high-performing, yet humble
 *Technical Account Manager* 
 with a strong tech background and interest to play a pivotal role in our rapid expansion within the Nordic market. As one of Europe's fastest-growing companies in the industry, expanding in the Nordics remains a key strategic goal.
 



  





 As part of the Client Management team, you’ll be responsible for growing our client partnerships as well as initiating long-term collaborations between clients and developers. As our future
 **Technical Account Manager** 
 , you’ll focus on the Nordic countries where the demand for skilled developers is growing.
 



  





**What your week will look like:** 




  




* Lead initial client ‘Intro’ meetings to gain an in-depth understanding of their business and development needs, effectively pitch Proxify, and secure the next steps to matching them with their next developer.
* Drive deals through the sales funnel once qualified - ensuring speed and quality.
* Work closely with the Client Engineering team to carefully match the opportunity with the right developer, ensuring their skills and experience are the right fit for client requirements.
* Close deals, onboard clients and nurture strong client relationships.
* Continuously contribute to improving our ways of working and increase efficiency and success as we grow and evolve.
* Directly impact the growth and success of Proxify Inc and its clients by matching them with exceptional candidates and establishing long-term partnerships.



  





**Why you’ll love this opportunity at Proxify:** 




  





 🌐 Get the possibility to solve most tech teams’ biggest challenge - bridging their competence gap - and at the same time offer great opportunities to developers around the world
 



 ❤️ Join a team of tech lovers where support and humility are our guiding principles
 



 📈 Spearhead the growth of client partnerships in the Nordic countries
 



 🚀 Great opportunities for professional development and personal growth
 



 ✈️ Work in a truly international environment where we from time to time meet and spend quality time together (our team spanning 39 countries!)
 



  





**To be successful in this role, we believe that you:** 




  




* Have hands-on experience with technology, such as working as a technical project manager, product manager, developer, or a similar role, ideally within a tech team
* Have an intrinsic sense of urgency, responsibility and ownership
* Are passionate about closing the competence gap in tech
* Possess a curiosity about technological innovations and trends, continually seeking to understand how they can be leveraged to solve real-world problems and improve efficiency
* Understand how to help a client and guiding them through the customer journey
* Are not just a talker; you make things happen and pay keen attention to details!



  





**Why it may not be your match:** 




  





 ❌ You like everyday to look the same (clear routines and process), this might not be for you because we build as we go and keep agile
 



 ❌ You don't have any technical experience
 



 ❌ You don’t speak Swedish on a native level
 



  





 At Proxify, we believe that together, we can achieve our dreams. Anything is possible, with the right people. Are you in?
 



  





 Be our guest and visit our website to learn more about us. Can’t wait to meet you! 🚀
 



  





*Kindly submit your application and CV in English, as this is the standardized language we use at Proxify.*

title: Senior Project Manager
description:
Om tjänsten
   

  

 Join our team as a Senior Project Manager in Vattenfall Procurement!
   

  

 As Senior Project Manager, you will play a critical role in driving implementation of new tools and processes to support the continuous drive to higher efficiency and effectiveness across the Procurement function. You will have the opportunity to work closely with the Chief Procurement Officer and Procurement Directors, IT Management, Finance and Business Information Officers of various business units. You will report directly, in a solid line to Head of Procurement Solutions and Analytics in the Procurement Excellence Unit.
   

  

 If you have the passion for project management and enjoy working with a variety of stakeholders, this is the job for you!
   

  

**Your main responsibilities:**
 Project Management
   

  

* Manage the identification, staffing, launch and delivery of group-wide Procurement infrastructure projects;
* Initiate the project, define project scope, objectives and draft the project proposal;
* Formulate and negotiate the Project Initiation Documents, develop and monitor detailed project plans, determine budget and required resources;
* Coordinate, monitor and drive the project, within defined plan and budget and manage project issues and changes and take corrective actions when necessary;
* Proactively monitor risks that threaten project success and define alternative ways to mitigate these risks;
* Identify and manage dependencies with other projects.


 Reporting
   

  

* Set up, maintain and report project budgets, proactively provide and report insights to project stakeholders with respect to project efficiency, project effectiveness, project status, development, risks and issues;
* Evaluate and close project and Identify, analyze and share lessons learned, archive project documents and hand over project where applicable.


 Stakeholder Management
   

  

* Build and maintain a network of internal and external stakeholders/partners and proactively inform and involve the Steering Committee and other key stakeholders


 Din bakgrund
   

  

 To be successful in this role we believe you have:
   

  

* University degree or equivalent.
* Minimum 3 years' experience in a procurement function.
* Experience with the successful implementation of S4HANA within an multinational organisation
* Detailed knowledge of operational and strategic Procurement processes.
* Project and change management experience, including evidence leading internal continuous improvement projects/initiatives.


 It is meritorious if you have:
   

  

* Experience in business process modelling in an international environment (including use of BPM tools).
* Experience developing procurement tools and systems.
* Experience standardising/optimising processes.
* Development of control frameworks and/or KPIs for business processes.
* Project Management certification or equivalent.
* CIPS certification or equivalent.


**We are looking for a person** 
 who is a doer, engaged and who is able to drive projects through to a finish autonomously. You will collaborate with a lot of different stakeholders in this position, to thrive you should have excellent stakeholder management skills. We also believe you enjoy working with others and are good at building relationships. To be successful we believe you are structured in your way of working, a logical thinker and with an eye for continuous improvement.
   

  

 Mer information
   

  

**Our Offer**
 We offer a challenging and international work environment and the possibility to work with some of the best in the field. You will be working in interdisciplinary teams and you can always count on support from committed colleagues as ‘Ask and Share’ concept is essential for the way we work. We offer attractive employment conditions (smart working, flexible working hours and a good-work-life balance) and opportunities for personal and professional development. Click here for further information.
   

  

**Locations:** 
 Stockholm, Luleå, Berlin, Hamburg, Amsterdam or London
   

  

**For more information** 
 about the position you are welcome to contact hiring manager Sven Jacobs, Sven.Jacobs@vattenfall.com. For more information about the recruitment process you are welcome to contact our recruiter Elisabeth Hagman, Elisabeth.Hgaman@vattenfall.com.
   

  

 Trade Union representatives in Sweden via Vattenfall´s switchboard +46 8 739 50 00.
   

  

 Christer Gustafsson (Ledarna), Juha Siipilehto (Seko), Anders Bohlin (Unionen), Rolf Ohlsson (Akademikerna).
   

  

**We welcome your application in English no later than 13th of September** 
 . We kindly request that you do not send applications by any means other than via our website.
   

  

 At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to build a more profitable and attractive company and we strive to be a good role model regarding diversity. Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, transgender identity or expression, religion or other belief, disability or sexual orientation. Click here for further information.
   

  

 The security of Vattenfall and its employees is essential. For that reason, a pre-employment screening will be part of your recruitment process. The screening is based on the role you will fulfill within Vattenfall.
   

  

 Since Vattenfall is a part of the Swedish critical infrastructure, many of our services are security classed. If this position is security classed the final candidates might be subjected to a security vetting process, according to the Swedish legislation.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
 Since Vattenfall is a part of the Swedish critical infrastructure, many of our services are security classed. If this position is security classed the final candidates might be subjected to a security vetting process, according to the Swedish legislation.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

 Om oss
   

  

 Vattenfall is one of Europe’s largest producers and retailers of electricity and heat. Our main markets are Sweden, Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, and the UK. The Vattenfall Group has approximately 21 000 employees. We have been electrifying industries, powering homes and transforming life through innovation for more than 100 years. We now want to make fossil free living possible within one generation and we are driving the transition to a sustainable energy system.

title: Community Associate
description:
At Regus, we’ve built the world’s largest workspace network so that our customers can work better, faster, happier. Join us in one of our Regus centre teams. Bring more freedom to more people and businesses. And you’ll be able to work better, faster and happier too.
   

  

**The opportunity**
 As a Community Associate, you’ll work closely with new and existing customers, solving problems for them and making sure they have everything they need.
   

  

**A typical day at Regus**
 You arrive 15 minutes before your centre opens to make sure everything is ready and check there’s nothing the cleaners have missed.
   

  

 Customers start coming in thick and fast. One asks you for a changed WiFi code. Another wants to know if his important package has arrived. A woman needs directions to her meeting room… and can you help her set up the projector and take an order for drinks?
   

  

 The mail arrives. You sort through it while dealing with a whole host of other customer requests, remembering to email the customer from earlier to let him know his package is waiting for him in his mailbox. And that’s lunch.
   

  

 Early afternoon, you sit down with the Community Manager to discuss the organisation of next week’s networking event. You plan and write the invites to customers, then create, print and put up posters on the noticeboards around the centre.
   

  

 The day is coming to a close. Time to gently ask the large group in meeting room 3 to start wrapping up. You direct them to the nice restaurant you know around the corner, so they can grab a bite and continue their discussion. Once the last person has left the building and everything’s nice and tidy, it’s time to head home.
   

  

**About You**
 We’re looking for someone who knows how to manage multiple tasks while providing customers with the best possible service. You also need to be:
   

  

* A good communicator, with the ability to build strong professional relationships and empathise with people’s needs
* Happy taking ownership of problems and finding ways to solve them
* Positive, enthusiastic and able to adapt to fast-changing situations
* Confident using MS Office and other basic IT packages


**What We Offer**
 On top of a competitive salary package you’ll enjoy:
   

  

* A bright and inspiring work environment
* Training and development opportunities

title: Account Manager Media
description:
**Description**
 As an Account Manager, you are driving digital transformations through effective engagement with C-level executives, business development executives, IT leaders, architects, developers, and various lines of businesses. You are establishing Amazon Web Services as the key cloud technology provider across the strategic accounts you manage, promoting the entire AWS products and services portfolio to enterprise media customers. On a daily basis you empower your customers to solve challenges while attaining both their operational and innovation goals. You deliver business outcomes while guiding them to become more agile, innovative, and efficient. With AWS, our customers benefit from the fastest pace of innovation, the broadest and deepest functionality, the most secure computing environment, and the most proven operational expertise.
   

  

 Do you look around corners for ways to engage and service customers? Are you passionate about using technology to solve business problems that have big customer impact?
   

  

 Come build the future with us.
   

  

 AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* Promote AWS services in a defined territory or industry vertical and execute against a comprehensive account/territory plan
* Create & articulate compelling value propositions around AWS services
* Facilitate customer adoption and maintain a robust projects pipeline
* Work with partners to extend reach & promote adoption
* Contribute to positive customer experience. Expect moderate travel


**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship and Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Hybrid Work
   

  

 We value innovation and recognize this sometimes requires uninterrupted time to focus on a build. We also value in-person collaboration and time spent face-to-face. Our team affords employees options to work in the office every day or in a flexible, hybrid work model near one of our Stockholm Amazon offices.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Experience as a quota carrying technology field sales individual, or business development professional
* Experience coordinating multiple members of the sales team dedicated to a particular account, such as Inside Sales, Solution Architects, Technical Account Managers etc.
* Experience increasing technology adoption and creating long term transformational account strategies. Experience working with and presenting to C-level executives, IT, and other lines of business
* Demonstrated success in identifying, developing, negotiating, and closing large-scale technology projects to Enterprise Customers
* Fluent in Swedish, Norwegian or Danish as well as English


**Preferred Qualifications**
* A technical or educational background in engineering, computer science
* Experience selling cloud solutions
* Cross functional selling experience (Architect, Sales Engineer, Professional Services, Partner, and ISV)


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
   

  

 Job ID: A2706150

title: Senior iOS/Infrastructure Engineer
description:
At Spotify, we are dedicated to enhancing the productivity and efficiency of our development processes. Engineers in the Client Platform studio work across various squads to ensure efficient, reliable, and scalable client development.
   

  

 As a Platform & Infrastructure Engineer in Client Platform you will play a crucial role in ensuring that our platform scales seamlessly and supports the rapid development and deployment of high-quality code. The focus is to iteratively improve the speed and accuracy of PR builds, enabling our developers to deliver features faster and with greater confidence. In this studio, we manage and optimize the infrastructure that supports the development of numerous Pull Requests (PRs) daily, ensuring that our platform can handle high volumes of builds efficiently. This has to be balanced with maintaining robust systems that prioritize safety and reliability, ensuring that our development processes are resilient and dependable. We also make sure to develop tools and processes to monitor and enhance code quality, with a particular emphasis on detecting and mitigating flakiness in tests and builds.
   

  

 We are looking for a talented and driven iOS Engineer with a specialization in Infrastructure. Your primary responsibilities will include improving the infrastructure that supports Spotify's cross functional teams, ensuring comprehensive testing processes, and optimizing our Continuous Integration (CI) pipelines.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Develop and Maintain CI Pipelines: Design, implement, and maintain CI pipelines to ensure efficient and reliable build, test, and deployment processes for iOS applications
* Automate Testing Processes: Create and improve automated testing frameworks and tools to ensure comprehensive test coverage and high-quality releases
* Collaborate with Development Teams: Work closely with iOS developers to integrate CI/CD and testing practices into their workflows and ensure smooth and efficient code merges
* Enhance Code Review Processes: Implement and maintain tools and processes for code review, to ensure code quality and consistency
* Monitor CI Systems: Continuously monitor the health and performance of CI systems, identifying and addressing bottlenecks and issues.
* Write clean and maintainable code that will scale across a number of projects and distributed development teams
* Share knowledge, promote best practices, and collaborate with some of the best engineers in the company
* Improve developer experience, the team is driven by a strong focus on clean APIs and engineering efficiency


 Who You Are
   

  

* You have 5+ years of proven experience in software development
* iOS development using Swift and Objective-C.
* managing and optimizing large-scale infrastructure and platform services.
* You have a strong understanding of CI/CD principles and best practices.
* You have a phenomenal ability to learn and expand your areas of expertise to tackle the problems in front of you.
* You are an inclusive colleague and a true phenomenal teammate.
* You have strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
* You're passionate about your work, striving towards the goals of the team and, ultimately, the Spotify mission - “giving a million creative artists the opportunity to live off their art and billions of fans the opportunity to enjoy and be passionate about it"
* Experience with CI tools such as TeamCity, Jenkins, BuildKite or equivalent
* Familiarity with automated testing frameworks and tools for iOS (e.g., XCTest, XCUITest)
* Familiarity with identifying and resolving issues related to code quality and test flakiness.


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* You'll be based in Stockholm, Sweden or London, UK.


 #Backend Engineer - Client Platform
   

  

 #Mobile
   

  

 #iOS
   

  

 #JobSite-Featured
   

  

 #JobSite-Remote-EMEA
   

  

 Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Account Manager till växande Elovade
description:
Elovade är ett bolag som strävar efter att tillhandahålla de absolut bästa lösningarna inom IT i syfte att underlätta arbetet och öka lönsamheten hos sina partners. De önskar nu utöka teamet och söker efter en driven och hungrig Account Manager som vill växa in i rollen långsiktigt. Låter detta som någonting för dig? Sök då tjänsten redan idag då vi tillämpar ett löpande urval!
 



  

**Företag :**
 ELOVADE Sverige AB
 



  

**Plats :**
 Årsta
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Försäljning
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående eller enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Tjänsten som Account Manager på Elovade passar dig som vill ta steget in på ett spännande och växande It-företag.
